parameters.name: AppId
parameters.description: The application ID. You can specify only one application ID. The ID can be up to 64 characters in length and can contain letters, digits, underscores (_), and hyphens (-).

parameters.name: TaskId
parameters.description: The task ID. You can specify only one task ID. The ID can be up to 55 characters in length and can contain letters, digits, underscores (_), and hyphens (-). The ID must be unique.
